ReportSpec.Name: Top Donors Report
ReportSpec.Description: A report showing the top donors
ReportSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

DataRetrieval.CreateSQL:
create procedure BBDW.[USR_USP_REPORT_TOPDONORSREPORT] ( @MAXROWS tinyint = 10, @STARTDATE datetime, @ENDDATE datetime, @SHOWADVANCEDFILTERS bit = 0, @INCLUDENOTPOSTED bit, @INCLUDEANONYMOUS bit, @INCLUDEPLEDGES bit ) as
select top (@MAXROWS) c.[FULLNAME], c.[CONSTITUENTLOOKUPID], c.[PRIMARYADDRESS], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSCITY], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSSTATEABBREVIATION], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSPOSTCODE], 'http://www.blackbaud.com/CONSTITUENTID?CONSTITUENTID=' + CONVERT(nvarchar(36), c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID]) as [CONSTITUENTDRILLTHROUGH], isnull(sum(r.[REVENUEAPPLICATIONAMOUNT]), 0) as [TOTALREVENUEAMOUNT], max(r.[REVENUEDATE]) as [LASTGIFTDATE] from BBDW.[DIM_CONSTITUENT] c left join BBDW.[FACT_REVENUE] r on c.[CONSTITUENTDIMID] = r.[CONSTITUENTDIMID] left join BBDW.[DIM_REVENUEFLAG] rf on r.[REVENUEFLAGDIMID] = rf.[REVENUEFLAGDIMID] left join BBDW.[DIM_REVENUECODE] rc on r.[REVENUECODEDIMID] = rc.[REVENUECODEDIMID] where (@STARTDATE is null or r.[REVENUEDATE] > @STARTDATE) and (@ENDDATE is null or r.[REVENUEDATE] < @ENDDATE) and (rf.[GIVENANONYMOUSLY] = 0 or @INCLUDEANONYMOUS = 1) and (rc.[REVENUEPOSTSTATUSCODE] > 1 or @INCLUDENOTPOSTED = 1) and (rc.[REVENUEAPPLICATIONCODE] <> 2 or @INCLUDEPLEDGES = 1) group by c.[FULLNAME], c.[CONSTITUENTLOOKUPID], c.[CONSTITUENTSYSTEMID], c.[PRIMARYADDRESS], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSCITY], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSSTATEABBREVIATION], c.[PRIMARYADDRESSPOSTCODE] order by sum(r.[REVENUEAPPLICATIONAMOUNT]) desc
